sentences.english: You can also create ringtones out of songs you downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以將你下載的歌曲製作成手機鈴聲。

sentences.english: A beautiful ballad written by Hins Cheung.
sentences.chinese: 這是張敬軒寫的一首很優美動聽的歌曲。

sentences.english: Usually songs that are good to dance have terrible words.
sentences.chinese: 通常來說，可以用來伴舞的歌曲歌詞都很差勁。

sentences.english: First of all, I sing a song for country songs.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我爲大家唱一首鄉村歌曲。

sentences.english: Heroic soul grows out of fashion like an old song.
sentences.chinese: 渴望絢爛的靈魂早已老去，逝成一首古老的歌曲。

sentences.english: People in many countries can understand English songs.
sentences.chinese: 很多國家的人們都聽得懂英文歌曲。
一首關於虛雲老和尚的歌曲。

sentences.english: This song have got a lot of awards in hong kong.
sentences.chinese: 曾經攞過好多合唱歌曲獎既歌。

sentences.english: By the end of last term, we had learned about 2000 English songs.
sentences.chinese: 到上學期期末，我們已經學了約2000個英語歌曲。

sentences.english: You can also learn to sing some Chinese songs.
sentences.chinese: 你還學習唱一些中文歌曲。

sentences.english: She said that memorizing the words of English songs helped a little.
sentences.chinese: 她說記風行歌曲歌詞也有點幫忙。

sentences.english: Kookaburra " is a well-loved children ' s song from Australia."
sentences.chinese: “翠鳥”是一首澳大利亞歌曲，深受孩子們的喜愛。

sentences.english: The song is from Goodnight & Go single.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌曲是從晚安轉到單。

sentences.english: She played the main part of the songs on the lowest guitar strings.
sentences.chinese: 她彈吉他弦上最低的歌曲的主要部分。

sentences.english: The Beatles created some of the best-loved songs of all time.
sentences.chinese: 披頭四樂團創作出一些史上最受歡迎的歌曲。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen the Thriller image when he was made up?
sentences.chinese: 你以前見過他在歌曲毛骨悚然中塑造的形象嗎？

definition: sung performance/to sing for an audience
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
